title: Looking for Gold/Plat Mid or Support for Competitive flex team
body:
Our team is currently looking for a mid laner or support to join us for flex games on a regular basis.
our team is current within the gold/plat range in both flex and solo/duo, so we ask anyone wanting to join us is also within those requirements.
we currently play from 6:30pm - 10:30pm AEDT weekdays, with weekends based on availability.

It is expected that applicants be able to accept constructive criticisms, as well as be willing to learn additional champions should the need arise from the ever changing meta (sorry, no one tricks)
A working microphone and willingness to communicate during game is also expected, as we will be using discord during games.

for more information or to apply, add either myself (Zami) or Shiney
